# Metamagic, Silent, Lesser
## Overview
**Aura** strong (no school); **CL** 17th

**Slot** none

**Price** 3,000 gp

**Weight** 5 lbs.

**Description**

The wielder can cast up to three spells (from 1st through 3rd level) per day without verbal components as though using the [[Silent Spell (Feat)|Silent Spell]] feat.

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Craft Rod (Feat)|Craft Rod]], [[Silent Spell (Feat)|Silent Spell]]

**Cost** 1,500 gp

**Source:** Core Rulebook, pg. 485
